item.title: Yes Bank Eyes Wealth Foray After Deal With Japan’s SMBC
item.description: Indian private lender Yes Bank Ltd. is exploring entering the country’s fiercely competitive $1 trillion wealth management space following its strategic partnership with Japan’s Sumitomo Mitsui Bankin
